Title: China’s ENN halts LNG trucked deliveries on typhoon concerns
Description: Chinese independent energy firm ENN has suspended trucked deliveries of LNG from its 5 million tonnes a year (mtpa) Zhoushan LNG receiving terminal on Zhoushan island in China’s eastern Zhejiang province as heavy rains and strong winds brought by Typhoon In-Fa have forced local authorities to close a bridge linking Zhoushan island to the mainland
Author: CK

Title: Guangdong Energy seeks two September LNG cargoes
Description: Chinese utility Guangdong Energy is seeking two cargoes for delivery across September through a tender that closes tomorrow
Author: CK

Title: Angola LNG offers one August-September LNG cargo
Description: Angola LNG has issued a tender to sell one cargo on a delivered ex-ship (DES) basis across Aug. 21-Sep.18  from its 5.2 million tonnes a year (mtpa) Soyo liquefaction facility through a tender that closes on July 29
Author: CK

Title: Pakistan seeks seven October-November LNG cargoes
Description: State-owned Pakistan LNG (PLL) has issued a tender to buy a total of seven cargoes for delivery across October and November to the Pakistan Gasport terminal at Port Qasim in Karachi. The submission deadline for offers is Aug. 24.
Author: CK
